channel.title: Homes on Li Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Li Chen

item.description: Bio Chen Li (陈力) is currently a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. He is working on topics in data center networking under the supervision of Prof. Kai Chen. He is a Microsoft Research Asia PhD Fellow, and has published 10+ peer-reviewed papers in top journals and conferences. His network acceleration subsystems and scheduling algorithms have seen deployment in Big Data systems in Huawei and Tencent.

item.title: Professional & Teaching Experience
item.description: Internship: Software Engineer in Tencent (Jun 2015 - Jul 2017) Technology Analyst in Royal Bank of Scotland (Jun - Aug 2010) Certified Instructor at NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute (Oct 2017 - Now): Deep Learning Demystified Best Practices for Starting a Deep Learning Project Applications of Deep Learning with Caffe, Theano and Torch Image Classification with DIGITS Object Detection with DIGITS Image Segmentation with TensorFlow Neural Network Deployment Teaching Assistant at HKUST:
